lines.content: Xizi is a personal assistant chatbot designed to help you manage tasks efficiently. Whether you need to track deadlines, events, or simple to-dos, Xizi has you covered. With a simple command-line interface, Xizi ensures you stay organized.
To add a deadline task, use the deadline command. This action creates a new task with a specific deadline that Xizi will keep track of.
